text: This is brilliant! I can't wait to see what creative swear words the AI comes up with.
Oh great, just what we needed – a new way for people to insult each other online.
I think it's all in good fun, and could actually lead to some interesting linguistic developments.
Agreed. Plus, it'll be harder for word filters to catch these custom swears, so the internet might become a more... colorful place.
I'm more interested in the technology behind this. Does anyone know what kind of AI architecture they're using? GPT-4, maybe?
Their website mentions that they're using a custom GPT-4 based model trained on a diverse dataset of swear words and colloquial expressions. I'd be curious to see how they curated the training data.
They probably scraped forums, social media, and any other source of text where people are likely to use swear words. Sounds like a fun job.
I wonder how many people on the team just sat there reading profanities all day. Sign me up!
Any idea how they're monetizing this? Are they selling an API or something?

They offer a freemium model with a limited number of generated swear words per month. There's a subscription plan for unlimited access, and they also have an API for businesses to integrate into their own applications.
I can see this being popular for online gaming and chat apps. They could even create custom "swear packs" for users to purchase.
I would totally buy a "Shakespearean Insults" pack. Make it happen!
